```{r setup}
library(alcyon)
```

```{r}
galleryMap <- st_read(
  system.file(
    "extdata", "testdata", "gallery",
    "gallery_lines.mif",
    package = "alcyon"
  ),
  geometry_column = 1L, quiet = TRUE
)
```

```{r}
pointMap <- makeVGAPointMap(galleryMap,
                            fillX = 3.01,
                            fillY = 6.7,
                            gridSize = 0.04)
vgaMap <- pointMapToSf(pointMap)$map

plot(vgaMap)
```
